text.autoconfig.compact-chat.title: Compact Chat Config
text.autoconfig.compact-chat.option.only:
Messages will only be compacted if
they are sent directly after each other.

Changing this setting will clear chat history!

Example when enabled:
  <Player>: hi
  <Player>: hey
  <Player>: hi <- Will not be compacted
Example when disabled (default):
  <Player>: hi
  <Player>: hey
  <Player>: hi <- Will be compacted
text.autoconfig.compact-chat.option.igno:
If enabled, messages containing
"------"and "======" won't be
compacted.
text.autoconfig.compact-chat.option.maxi:
Messages which have been sent over this
amount of times will not be counted anymore.

For example, if set to 100, anything over
100 will turn into 100+.
text.autoconfig.compact-chat.option.igno:
The number of characters to ignore
at the start of each message when compacting.

Useful for mods that add timestamps
to the beginning of messages.
